Need to generate $n=500$ values for $X_1=cos(t)$ and $X_2=e^{-t}-5e^{-t/5}$. Assume that $t$ is generated by a standard normal distribution.

```{r}

t <- rnorm(500)

X_1 <- cos(t)

X_2 <- exp(-t) - 5*exp(-t/5)


```
